Strength to endure and a sincere mind, you now possess both,
Abandoning worldly glory and profit, advance and follow me.
What person does not turn towards profit?
Without profit, even relatives leave. You now follow me in vain, not seeking present-life rewards.
When a husband and wife give birth to a child, it is to continue the family line,
Therefore they respectfully serve the king, to repay the kindness of nurturing.
Everyone seeks profit, you alone turn your back on profit and wander.
Utmost words are not complicated, I will now briefly inform you,
Your service to me is already complete, now ride the horse back.
From my long night of coming, the place I sought is now obtained.

For me, request the king to abandon his feelings of love and longing,
In order to escape birth, old age, and death, I will enter the forest of austerities.
I do not seek rebirth in the heavens, but I am not without feelings of longing,
I also do not harbor resentment, I only wish to abandon sorrow and grief.
For a long night, we have accumulated affection and love, but we must part ways.
Because we will eventually part, I seek the causes of liberation.
If one attains liberation, there will never be a time of separation from loved ones,
I have left home to end sorrow, do not sorrow over your son;

The ancestors, the victorious kings, their firm resolve did not waver,

When the wife's life ends, all the property is left to the son,

If it is said that youth is not the time for wandering and studying,
One should know that seeking the true Dharma, there is no time that is not the time.
Impermanence has no fixed time, the enemy of death always lurks,
Therefore, today I will definitely seek the Dharma.
All that has been requested above, you should proclaim for me,
I only wish that the father-king will no longer look back on me with longing.
If it is said that my appearance is ugly and causes the king to cut off affection,

Channa, receiving the command, was grief-stricken and confused,

Sorrow and grief will increase and deepen, like an elephant sinking in deep mud.

The prince grew up in the deep palace, young, enjoying bodily softness and comfort,

When you first ordered me to get the horse, my feelings were very uneasy,

What is the intention of causing the prince to definitely abandon the deep palace?
The entire country of Kapilavastu will give rise to grief and pain.
The king, your father, is already old, and his love for his son is deep.
To resolutely abandon him and leave the household life is not appropriate.
Those with wrong views have no parents, so there is no need to discuss them.
Gautami raised you, and her breasts dried up from nursing you.
It is difficult to forget her kindness and love, so do not be a person who turns their back on kindness.
The mother of an infant with merits, a noble clan can serve her.
To obtain victory and then abandon her is not a noble person.
The excellent son of Yashodhara, who will inherit the kingdom and uphold the true Dharma,

You have already disobeyed and abandoned the king, your father, and your relatives and family members.

Because I am deeply ashamed, my tongue cannot speak.

The prince heard Chanda's sorrowful and bitter admonitions,

In the wilderness, there is a tall and luxuriant tree, where flocks of birds gather to roost.

You should temporarily stop your worries and suffering, follow my teaching and return,

The people of Kapilavastu, hearing my determined mind,
